Dwarf React: After a chacter adjacent to Sorrow suffers one or more wounds, Sorrow suffers the wounds instead.
"Merrick or Rockhome…it doesn't matter. Wherever we go there is pain and suffering."

name: Sorscha's Cloak
effect: Armor Order: Once per turn, move this character forward up to two ranks. React: Spend Sorscha's Cloak instead of stunning (not spending) this character when he or shee falls forward from an illegal rank.

name: Spotter
effect: Spend Order: Stun this character if he or she is in the first rank and select one opposing first rank. Until the end of the turn, any ranged strikes targeting a character in that opposing rank receive +2 to the die roll.

name: Spring Attack
effect:
Spend Order: Move this rogue forward one rank. If this moves the rogue into the first rank, he or she may perform a melee strike and then move back one rank.
Scream for me, and I'll keep the necromancers away from you.

name: Squire Parthus
effect:
Deverenian
Aedroud Spend Order: Squire Parthus performs a number of melee strikes equal to his level.
Such potential festereth within Aedroud... - Lord Gahid Rellion

name: St'rga
effect:
Nothrog May not attack. Order: Once per turn, perform a melee strike with an ATK of +3
"She kills only on command, Why is she with Uthanak?" -Krun

name: Staff of Calix
effect: Weapon Order: Once per game, attach a 1st level wizard spell to the Staff. While the spell is attached, this character can cast the spell once per turn as if it were played from your hand.

name: Staff of Light
effect:
Weapon Shield This character gains +2 AC when targeted by a melee strike or ranged strike performed by an Undead character. Order: Discard the Staff of Light to target all Undead characters within one rank. Inflict one wound on the target characters.
Away with you, pretenders to terror -Modred of Carcius

name: Staff of Necromancy
effect:
Weapon Necromancer only. React: Spend the Staff after this character casts a spell that allows you to search your deck. You may serach your discard pile in addition to your deck.
What price forever?

name: Staff of the Wild
effect:
Weapon Shaman only. React: Spend the Staff before a character in your army moves forward or backward a rank without Manquvering. That character may move one additional rank.
"Tear the forest apart, and bring me the traitor's head." -Taoth

name: Steelcutters
effect:
Arrow Figher and rogue only. Non-spell ranged strikes performs by this character ignore AC bonuses from Armor, Gauntlet, Helm, and Shield items.
"Two inches of metal that tear through Deverenain steel. Two inches of metal, and Denska is free." -Lord Halbrook

name: Still Mind
effect:
Order: This rogue gains +6 skill until the end of the turn.
"Watch the enemy long enough, and they will kill themselves for us." -Rabinus Zon

name: Stone Skin
effect:
"Spend Order: Target a character in your army and attach this card to the character. While this card is attached, the character has the ability: ""Characters without a Weapon equipped may not target this character with melee strikes."" Discard this card at the end of the turn 3 turns after this one."
Finished so soon, Denskan? Permit me then, to retort. - Sorceress Ygraine

name: Strength
effect:
Dwarf Dwarven Defender While in play, Strength is considered two characters for determining illegal ranks. Spend Order: Remove two wounds from Strength.
"Do your worst, Abyssal. I will not fall!"

name: Stza Fasthand
effect: Mercenary May not equip items. Spend Order: Target another character in play. The target may perform a melee strike targeting Stza. If Stza is still in play after the strike (or if no strike is performed), she performs a melee strike against the target character.

name: Suicidal Charge
effect: Spend Order: Move this character forward one rank. If this moves the character into the 1st rank, he or she may immediately perform an attack without spending, and with an additional melee strike (ATK +1). This character is killed at the end of the turn.

name: Superior Positioning
effect:
Order: This character gains +3 ATK until the end of the turn. Melee strikes and ranged strikes targeting this character subtract -3 from their rolls until the end of the turn.
"We can stave off the Elven attack from here for a while." -Maeve ni Duhonn

name: Tag Team
effect: Scouts perform this action without spending. Spend React: Play after an adjacent character performs a melee strike targeting an opposing character. If the strike hits, this character may perform a melee strike targeting the same character.

name: Take Me
effect:
React: Play after another character in your army is targeted by a melee strike. This cleric becomes the new target.
"Look at you lot. The worst the Abyss has to offer? Pah! Cowardly offal that can't even take an old man like me." -Garn Hearthstone

name: Talise
effect:
Elf Myreth Spend React: After another character performs a melee strike targeting Talise, if he is still in play Talise performs a melee strike targeting the attacking character.
"Myreth was our home before it was Signon's."

name: Tallenis
effect:
Elf Scout Spend Order: Target an Elf adjacent to Tallenis. Move the target character forward one rank.
"You first."

name: Tara
effect: Free Kingdoms Saboteur Tara gains +5 ATK while she performs a melee strike targeting a Siege character, and inflicts an additional wound if she hits. Tara gains +5 AC while she is the target of a melee strike or ranged strike by a Siege character

name: Technomancy
effect: This character's Ranged strikes that are generated from an item add +3 to the roll. Skill checks and saves genereated from an item on this character have a +4 DC.

name: Tender Mercies
effect:
Spend Order: Target a character in an opposing first rank. Until the end of the turn, the target suffers -5 AC and may not attack.
"Hush, It will all be over before you know it." -Behlial

name: The Motivator
effect:
"Nothrog
Siege May not equip items or attack. Character adjacent to one or more unstunned Motivators gain the ability: ""Order: Once per turn, perform a melee strike."" Spend Order: Once per turn, target any lower-level spent characters adjacent to the Motivator. Ready the target character(s)."

name: The Power of Faith
effect: React: Before this character casts a spell that requires a magic save, target up to two other unstunned characters in your army. Stun the target characters to add their combined levels to the spell's DC.

name: The Revel of Bascaron
effect:
Order: This wizard must succeed with a Fortitude save (DC 14) or suffer two wounds. If the wizard succeeds, then until the end of the turn, all characters in play have the Monster trait.
"This could take all day." -Lady Tornhawk

name: The Thrill of Victory
effect:
React: Play after an adjacent character kills an opposing character with a melee strike or action. If the opposing character was of equal or higher level than this character, ready this character.
"Flee back to thy bone orchards, Elves. Myreth is ours." -Lord Gahid Rellion

name: The Time to Act
effect:
Spend React: Play after you win Initiative by at least 10. You may perform an additional Order before your first Order of the turn.
"I win, good sir knight. Go back to your family." -Purge

name: Theodor Hyral
effect:
Free Kingdoms Order: Once per turn, discard an item equiped by Theodor to perform a ranged strike. Theodor receives a bonus to the ranged strike roll equal to the level of the discarded item.
"There's no room for pride in war."

name: Thundercall Javelin
effect: Weapon Shield Spend Order: Discard the Thundercall Javelin to make a +4 ranged strike. If it hit, the strike inclicts an additional wound, and spends the target. Characters adjacent to the target must then succeed with a magic save (DC 15) or become spent.

name: Timid Imp
effect:
Mercenary After you put another character into play in this rank, return Timid Imp to your hand. You may not put any Timid Imps into play this turn.
"When you're done playing, Edouard, we can get back to studying." -Gaston Bonhomme

name: Token of Thanks
effect:
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike, then move this character forward or backward one rank.
"Misearis is far too interesting for my tastes." -Keziah

name: Trade Routes
effect:
SPEND ORDER: Search your deck for three different items and show them to the player to your left. That player selects one item. Put the selected item in your hand and discard the others.
"Markappal, Andover, and Lion's Jaw have ports enough to allow trade, and without Elven interference." - Maxmillian

name: Trebuchet
effect:
Nothrog Siege May not equip item or attack. Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike that may target a character in any rank. Stun the Trebuchet.
"Where are you, Savrukk?" -Taoth

name: Trick Riding
effect:
Fighter and rogue only. React: After this character is targeted by a melee strike or ranged strike, spend a Steed equipped by this character to give him or her +5 AC until the end of the turn.
"That's it. Follow right after me." -Darian Windson

name: Tyrius
effect:
Elf • Scout
Stealth +8
Enter Toris Kelt, than attack. Choke them on their own dead. - Sauguinel

name: Unbroken Chain
effect:
React: Play when this character is in an illegal rank. Move this character back one rank.
"Misearis to Baraxton, Baraxton to Lukkot. The south of the Accord is mine." -Nassiral Hate

name: Unprepared for Battle
effect:
REACT: Play before this fighter makes a melee strike roll targeting a lower-level character with no items equipped. The strike is a critical success.
"Forgive the interruption, Milady of Misearis. Please, finish your dinner." - Krun

name: Validan
effect:
Mercenary Master of Combat While Validan has a Shield equipped, he may ignore any restrictions on making mulitple strikes during an attack.
"Misearis' greatest gladiator, and most popular slave." -Keziah

name: Vandal's Dance
effect:
REACT: After this character makes a melee strike roll that hits the target, target an item equipped by the opponent. The target item is discarded.
"I hear thy courage has followed thy weapon, brigand." - Duke Blackthorne

name: Vareth
effect:
Nothrog Unique Scout Spend Order: Perform a +7 ranged strike, then a +2 ranged strike. React: Once per turn, after Vareth hits with a melee strike or ranged strike, the strike inflicts an additional wound.
"Taoth's pet killer. Every throat slit is devotion to his mistriss." -Sethusk

name: Vigil
effect:
Spend Order: Attach this card to this character. While this card is attached, this character is a Paladin and can cast 1st level cleric spells.
"If good cannot come from evil, how did the Aroch paladins come from the Black Sun?" -Squire Lucian

name: Vines that Bind
effect:
Druid only Order: Target all characters in one opposing rank. All items equipped by the target characters become spent.
"This is our forest, manling. Even in your victory, you should have remembered that." -Dravan

name: Viscount Jameth
effect:
Deverenian Imperial Advisor React: After you put a character from another faction into play, that character permanently gains the Deverenian trait.
"Come, milady Dashkova. The view from above is so much the sweeter…"

name: Watcher
effect:
Dwarf Melee strikes performed by Watcher ignore the effects of the Astral and Ethereal traits.
"I'm old, fiend, not incompetent."

name: Weapon Finesse
effect: "Fighters and rogues play this as a 3rd level action. Order: Attach this card to a Weapon equipped by this character. While this card is attached, the Weapon has the ability: ""React: Spend this Weapon after this character fails a melee strike roll to reroll the die."""

name: Weapon Master
effect:
Barbarian only. Order: This character may immediately equip a Weapon, ignoring class requirements for that Weapon.
"No trick to it, really. Figure out which end's for killin', and that's all you need." -Rraag'nar

name: Wild Shape
effect: Druid only. Spend Order: Attach this card to this character. While this cars is attached, this Druid is a Lycanthrope. If this character equips a Lycanthrope Form that requires other items be discarded, those items are not discarded but are considered blank while the Lycanthrope Form is equipped.

name: Will O' Wisp
effect:
Mercenary Monster May not equip items or attack. May not be targeted by ranged strikes or spells.
"The bog's choked with Brindle's potions, and with those who drank them." -Keziah

name: Winter's Chill
effect:
Weapon React: After this character inflicts one or more wounds with a melee strike on a character that already has one or more wounds, kill the target.
"Live or die - either way, you'll talk." -Lord Winter

name: Wolf Companion
effect: Familiar Druid only React: Once per strike, after a melee strike targeting this character, spend the Wolf Companion to perform a melee strike (ATK +0) targeting the attacking character. React: Discard Wolf Companion after this character suffers one or more wounds to reduce the wounds by one.

name: Woodsman's Bow
effect: BOW RANGER or SCOUT only. SPEND ORDER: If this character is a SCOUT, perform two consectutive +3 ranged strikes. SPEND ORDER: If this character is a RANGER, perform a +2 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound if it hits. SPEND ORDER: Perform a +6 ranged strike.

name: Word
effect:
Dwarf Bard Charisma +5 React: Once per turn, after Word is targeted with a melee strike, he performs a Charisma check (DC 15 + attacker's level). If successful, the strike is canceled.
"Good news or bad, I'll get Xod's attention."

name: Wraithstone Dagger
effect:
Weapon React: Spend the Wraithstone Dagger before this character makes a melee strike roll to ignore the effects of the Astral or Ethereal trait for this strike.
"I know how to deal with ghosts." -Rreg'jen

name: Zandara
effect:
Mercenary Illusionist Spend Order: Perform two consecutive +3 ranged strikes. Characters hit by these strikes are spent instead of wounded.
"They are no more than dogs. They are no match for Zartoch."

name: Zartoch
effect: Mercenary Warlord Illusionist You may have up to five copies of Zartoch in your deck. React: If Zartoch is killed while he is your Warlord, target another Zartoch in your army who becomes your Warlord instead. Order: Spend all Zartochs in your army to search your deck for a Zartoch, reveal him, and put him in your hand.

name: Zoris
effect:
Elf Spend React: After an opposing character begins to perform an Order printed on his or her card, cancel the Order if Zoris is in the 1st rank.
"How weak these men must be, if simple cantrips distract them."
